casebody.data:
OLYMPIC SILK MILLS, Inc., Plaintiff in Error, v. Ichitaro SAITO, Doing Business under the Trade-Name and Style of Matsubun Company, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 1, 1927. No. 27. Robert Seelav, of New York City (Emanuel Fichandler, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Tison & Melick, of New York City (Harry C. Meliek, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
